testcase.name: Create User API test scenario
testcase.system-out: When Auth_login GET_AllUsers API using get method...........................passed Then Auth_login GET_AllUsers "get" API call got success with status code 200.passed Then The "id" varify GET_AllUsers responce "1"..............................passed Then The "email" varify GET_AllUsers responce "john@mail.com"...............passed Then The "password" varify GET_AllUsers responce "changeme".................passed Then The "name" varify GET_AllUsers responce "mossad".......................passed Then The "role" varify GET_AllUsers responce "admin"........................passed Then The "avatar" varify GET_AllUsers responce "https://i.imgur.com/LDOO4Qs.jpg".passed Then The "creationAt" varify GET_AllUsers responce "2025-08-15T23:04:13.000Z".passed Then The "updatedAt" varify GET_AllUsers responce "2025-08-15T23:04:13.000Z".passed
